column2: especially the perfectly smoked BBQ. Sides are great too
column3: the beans are just awesome. Don't expect to sit and have a private
column4: cozy conversation; the tables are pushed together and the dining area is small. My spouse and I enjoyed eating in but with the small
column5: tight space we'd probably not bring our little kids here. We'll be back and probably do takeout. If you're thinking about trying it
column7: especially if you like BBQ (and know what is "good" BBQ a la Memphis/Texas)! Â The food is worth it!
